entry.title: Photos Post 26: Updates
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to bring to your attention that the Incomplete Titles galleries are up to date. Grouped chronologically, the links to the 5 galleries are:
Incomplete Titles 1900 to 196x
Incomplete Titles 1970 to 197x
Incomplete Titles 1980 to 1983
Incomplete Titles 1984 to 198x
Incomplete Titles 1990 to 2011

Any help to complete some of these incomplete titles would be very much appreciated. Thank you!
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 73
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos of the special event 1995-0215 Launch of Sir C.P.'s book 'Lal Bahadur Shastri: A Life of Truth in Politics', Parliament House, Sydney, Australia have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 3 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Australia 1995.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 71
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos of the special event 1985-1117 Evening Program, after Diwālī Pūjā, Italy have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1985.
The event has as well 12 photos Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link Collection Moments of Joy.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
